title: Type ID for $
content:
I am working on a research project and need someone to do vast amounts of type identification.  
If interested, Contact me: [sberlow@fontbureau.com](mailto:sberlow@fontbureau.com).

 [‹ Donne Angular Latin ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20090327142452/http:/typophile.com/node/56156 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID on unknown modern Frutiger Next-like sans serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20090327142452/http:/typophile.com/node/56158 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sberlow
